completions.nl_description: Move all objects of size 1 one step up.
Recolor all objects of color R to the bottom until they reach the end of the grid or another object.
Extend vertically from the bottom row upwards, all the objects of color R.
Extend all the objects of color R downward without overlapping.
Extend all objects of color R towards the edge of the grid in both cases where the edge should not be surpassed.
Extend all objects of color R in all directions until they hit another object or the edge of the grid, without overlapping.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this other))
        (filter
            (color_equals (color_of this) R)
        )
        (apply
            (extend_node up false)
            (extend_node down false)
            (extend_node left false)
            (extend_node right false)
        )
    )
)

completions.nl_description: Move all objects of color R toward the bottom edge without overlapping.
Move objects of color R downwards to the nearest object.
Move all objects of color R one step down.
Recolor all objects of size 1 to color R.
Move all objects of color R up by one cell.
Move objects of color R towards objects of color B if they are neighbors
Move all objects of color R until they hit another object.
Extend all objects of color R upward, without overlapping.
Move all red objects one step up.
Move objects of color R upward and B downward until they hit another object or the grid edge.
completions.code:
(do
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) R))
        (apply (move_node_max up))
    )
    (rule
        (vars (this))
        (filter (color_equals (color_of this) B))
        (apply (move_node_max down))
    )
)
